query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS userBadges (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  petId INT NULL,
  badgeId INT NOT NULL,
  earnedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE KEY user_pet_badge_unique (userId, petId, badgeId)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3eqckq4ftCD9qZ9.97ac060fefbd --database AxjfrgzgnRVeokPdNtwmSN --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS userBadges (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  petId INT NULL,
  badgeId INT NOT NULL,
  earnedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE KEY user_pet_badge_unique (userId, petId, badgeId)
